name: Binary Core
description:
This game was made by one person in 5 days for Cyberpunk Jam 2019, so you can find bugs and problems while playing.

The music was created by Python Blue:

https://python-blue.bandcamp.com/

STORY

The year is 2094.

Hiroshi Senzo is a hacker who has been hired to steal information from the multinational Kitsune Robotics.

But something goes wrong when Hiroshi tries to access the company's database... now his life is in danger, will he be able to escape from the clutches of Kitashi Robotics?

Note
You can modify the mouse sensitivity and other parameters (like quality) in the "Options" menu.
